name: Galvantula

passive.name: Electroweb
passive.effect: If the opposing Active Pokemon switches out, the new Active Pokemon's attacks cannot do damage or put status on Galvantula.

attacks.name: Signal Beam
attacks.effect: Deals 70 damage minus 10 for each damage counter on Galvantula.

flavor: These massive tarantulas are horribly misunderstood, they make for loyal allies to the non-arachnaphobic trainer.
